project_abstract.cdata: The principal objectives of the project are to : i) alleviate the acute power shortage in Shandong; ii) develop large modern mine-mouth thermal power generating stations to make effective use of China's abundant coal resources; iii) continue the effort to transfer the appropriate advanced technology in plant design and project management for 600 MW thermal power units; iv) provide technical assistance to Shandong Provincial Electric Power Bureau (SPEPB) for institution building in the areas of environmental planning for thermal power stations and improving electricity tariff structures; and v) upgrade SPEPB's capability in financial management.  Project components consist of : a) the addition of two 600 MW generating units to the existing Zouxian thermal power plant to raise its total capacity to 2,400 MW; b) construction of 500 kv and 220 kv transmission lines and substations; c) provision of consulting services; d) provision of technical assistance to study the impact on air quality of thermal power expansion programs; e) carrying out a power tariff study; and f) a training program for the technical, financial and management staff of SPEPB.

P003503.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>邹县火电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是：（1）缓解山东省电力紧缺状况；（2）建设大型矿口热电站，有效利用中国丰富的煤炭资源；（3）继续促进转让电站设计和600兆瓦发电机组工程管理方面的适用先进技术；（4）向山东省电力局提供技术援助，支持其开展热电站环境规划和完善电价结构方面的制度建设；（5）提升山东省电力局的财务管理能力。项目内容包括：（1）为邹县热电厂新增两台600兆瓦发电机组，使其总装机容量增加到2400兆瓦；（2）架设500千伏和220千伏输电线路，建设配套变电站；（3）提供咨询服务；（4）提供技术援助，用于研究热电站扩容工程对空气质量的影响；（5）开展电价研究；（6）向山东省电力局技术、财务和管理人员提供培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
